SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.image.core.channel.factory

Class ChannelFactory

Object
VoxelDataTypeFactoryMultiplexer<ChannelFactorySingleType>
ChannelFactory
public class ChannelFactory extends VoxelDataTypeFactoryMultiplexer<ChannelFactorySingleType>
Creates a Channel corresponding to one of several data-types.

    • createEmptyInitialisedToSupportMaxValue

      public Channel createEmptyInitialisedToSupportMaxValue(Dimensions dimensions, long maxIntensityValueNeeded) throws CreateException
      Creates an empty initialized channel with discrete type with as minimal as needed data-type to support a maximum value.

      byte, short and int are tried in that order.

      Parameters:
      dimensions - dimensions.
      maxIntensityValueNeeded - the maximum value that the channel's data-type needs to support.
      Returns:
      a newly created channel of selected data-type with newly created buffers.
      Throws:
      CreateException - if the max value exceeds all supported data types.
